text:
When I submit a page with "notify reviewer" checked, the reviewers don't receive
a message.
creator: andreas@apache.org

text:
I tested it on zones and it seems to work there. It sends the message through
the internal system. Are you talking about via email? I need to verify this
functionality later today and will take a closer look at it.
creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
rfrovarp@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 19477
Removes review check

Code checked to see if submitter could also review the submitted document. If
this was true, it didn't send notification. This patch removes that check.

creator: andreas@apache.org
text: I can't reproduce the problem anymore.
